question: Write a letter to editor of the newspaper for claiming prize which they acknowledged.In your letter, you should say:•	Details of how you won the prize•	What the prize you are going to get•	What actions you expect to be taken.
text: I am writing this letter to express my dissatisfaction related with a knowledge competition related to drug abuse topic which was held during the month of April.

I was very keen when I read about this essay writing contest in your esteemed newspaper. After checking my eligibility to participate, I also send my entry to this competition and fortunately, my essay won 1st position in it. However, It has been two months since that day when the results are announced but still I did not get any award till now.

As it is clearly mentioned in the guidelines, the person who got the first rank will be given a trophy as well as a monetary prize of 10,000/- within a week. Yet, I did not receive any confirmation for the same. Also, I had sent all the documents demanded by the authorities yet I got no reward for attaining that position.

Though I contacted the helpline number, I get no response from them. Thus, It would be really commendable if you could please look into this matter so that I and the other contestants can get their rewards.
I am hoping that you will take this matter into your kind consideration and make arrangements for the timely disposal of the award money to the participants.
